title: Christy Buss Extends Heartfelt Congratulations to Ex-Husband Johnny Buss on His Presidential Run
text:
—
Following the announcement of Johnny Buss’s candidacy for President of the United States, Christy Curtis Buss, former wife and long-standing member of the Los Angeles Lakers family, extends heartfelt congratulations on his political journey. She will fully support him throughout the presidential race.
"Johnny's passion for leadership and his profound interest in the political landscape have always been evident," said Christy Buss in a statement today. “He is dedicated to fostering equity, sustainability, and education. This mirrors the values we hold dear as Americans. It is with full support and admiration that I wish him all the best in this noble endeavor.”
Christy’s encouragement comes from a place of deep respect for Johnny’s commitment to public service and his ability to inspire positive change. As someone who has shared many years of personal and professional life with Johnny, Christy’s support highlights the significance of his candidacy and the potential impact of his leadership on the nation.
"I have always admired Johnny's commitment to making a difference in the community and beyond. His venture into politics is a continuation of his life's work. He is striving for excellence and positive change. I stand by him 100% as he takes on this new journey," added Christy Buss.
Johnny Buss is known for his strategic role within the Los Angeles Lakers organization. His previous leadership of the Los Angeles Sparks and a professional indoor soccer team has embarked on a new path to lead the nation toward a future of equity, sustainability, and education. His campaign, promising a brighter America, has garnered attention and support from across the country.
"America's future is built on equity, sustainability, and education. Join Johnny Buss in building a brighter America for all," states his campaign website, a message that resonates with the core of his vision for the country.
The road ahead in the race for the presidency is acknowledged to be challenging. However, Christy Buss's statement highlights a deep belief in Johnny's capability and dedication to make a significant impact. As Johnny Buss steps forward to shape a brighter future for America, the support from his family, friends, and community will undoubtedly be a source of strength and inspiration.
About Christy Curtis Buss
Christy Curtis Buss has a dynamic presence in the entertainment and business sectors. She has made significant contributions through her work as a dancer, choreographer, and entrepreneur. Originating from St. Louis, Missouri, Christy has been involved in numerous endeavors that showcase her talent and leadership. She is the creator of the HEDO skincare line, a brand that emphasizes self-love, self-care, and the importance of skincare in achieving success. Her extensive background in dance, television, and choreography, combined with her entrepreneurial spirit, underscores her commitment to excellence and innovation.
